statements: SELECT * FROM game_server_data WHERE player_count > 50 ORDER BY server_id DESC
SELECT server_name, region FROM game_server_data WHERE region = 'EU'
SELECT server_id, player_count, max_player_count FROM game_server_data WHERE status = 'online' AND region = 'NA'
SELECT server_name, max_player_count FROM game_server_data WHERE player_count = 0
SELECT * FROM game_server_data WHERE server_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT server_name, player_count, status FROM game_server_data WHERE region = 'US' ORDER BY player_count DESC, server_name ASC
SELECT * FROM game_server_data WHERE player_count > 50 AND status = 'Active' ORDER BY max_player_count DESC
SELECT server_name, max_player_count, status FROM game_server_data WHERE status IN ('Active', 'Full') ORDER BY max_player_count ASC, server_name DESC
SELECT AVG(player_count) AS avg_player_count, MAX(max_player_count) AS highest_max_player_count FROM game_server_data WHERE region = 'EU'
SELECT * FROM game_server_data WHERE server_name LIKE 'Test%' ORDER BY server_id ASC
SELECT * FROM matchmaking_data;
SELECT player_id, player_rank FROM matchmaking_data WHERE player_rank > 100;
SELECT match_id FROM matchmaking_data WHERE player_rank > 50 ORDER BY match_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_rank, match_id FROM matchmaking_data WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, player_rank FROM matchmaking_data WHERE player_id = 3 AND match_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM matchmaking_data WHERE player_rank > 150 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_rank FROM matchmaking_data WHERE player_id = 100 OR player_id = 200;
SELECT player_id, player_rank FROM matchmaking_data JOIN game_session_data ON matchmaking_data.match_id = game_session_data.match_id WHERE game_session_data.start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) FROM matchmaking_data GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(player_rank) FROM matchmaking_data GROUP BY player_id HAVING AVG(player_rank) > 100;
SELECT * FROM matchmaking WHERE match_result = 'Win';
SELECT player_id, match_time FROM matchmaking ORDER BY match_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND session_start > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, wins, losses FROM player_stats WHERE wins > 10 ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT session_id, player_id, session_start, session_end FROM game_sessions WHERE session_end IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_id, match_time, match_result FROM matchmaking ORDER BY match_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, wins, games_played FROM player_stats WHERE wins > 10 AND games_played >= 50 ORDER BY wins DESC, games_played ASC;
SELECT player_id, session_start, session_end FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = '00d67f14-85ec-4f17-a36e-ec34e64cf39a' ORDER BY session_end DESC;
SELECT player_id, wins, losses, games_played FROM player_stats WHERE player_id IN ('345aa3a1-0d53-4f20-9c3b-11c79d208733','cc2de0b4-cf49-4f30-b507-8ff41fdc5973') ORDER BY wins DESC, player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, session_start, session_end FROM game_sessions WHERE session_end BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY session_end ASC, session_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_servers;
SELECT server_name, server_location FROM game_servers ORDER BY server_location DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_rank FROM players WHERE player_rank >= 10;
SELECT match_type, match_map FROM matches WHERE match_map = 'Mirage';
SELECT session_type, session_start, session_end FROM sessions ORDER BY session_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_servers;
SELECT server_name, server_location FROM game_servers WHERE server_location = 'USA';
SELECT player_name, player_rank FROM players ORDER BY player_rank DESC;
SELECT match_type, match_duration, match_map FROM matches WHERE match_type = 'Ranked' AND match_duration > 30;
SELECT session_id, session_type, session_start FROM sessions WHERE session_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_rank FROM players WHERE player_rank > 100;
SELECT server_name, region FROM game_servers WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT session_id, player_id, start_time FROM matchmaking_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, registration_date FROM players ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM matchmaking_sessions WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_rank FROM players WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND player_rank > 100 ORDER BY player_rank ASC;
SELECT server_name, region FROM game_servers WHERE status = TRUE ORDER BY server_name ASC;
SELECT session_id, player_id, player_status FROM session_players WHERE player_status = 'active' ORDER BY session_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM server_logs WHERE log_time >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY log_time DESC;
